name: Animate Preferences File
summary: An ANP file contains preferences exported by Adobe Animate, an application artists use to draw and publish interactive animations. It stores preferences related to various aspects of Animate, including auto-recovery intervals, UI theme and appearance, code editing settings, and configuration of drawing tools. Animate users export preferences as ANP files to save them or share them to set up Animate installations on other computers.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
